title: Safe + Strong
description: Keep your family and community safe and healthy with information, support and updates. Let's care for each other during COVID-19
cleaned_text: Effective May 11, 2023: Oregon's public health officials have lifted several COVID-19 response measures as the federal emergency ends. Learn more about the latest changes [here](https://www.oregon.gov/oha/PHE/Pages/index.aspx). Find answers about COVID-19 vaccines. Get support when you need it.
